mapper.select: select count(id) from member where id= #{id}
select m.name, m.gender, m.hp, i.register_date as registerDate, i.remain_date as remainDate, i.pt_count as ptCount from member m, info i where m.no = #{no}
mapper.update: update member m join info i on m.no = i.no set m.name = #{name}, m.gender = #{gender}, m.hp = #{hp}, i.register_date = #{registerDate}, i.remain_date = #{remainDate}, i.pt_count = #{ptCount} where m.no = #{no};
